subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The Golfweek cover, featuring a noose, showed that the Golf Channel’s Kelly Tilghman comment that one way for young golfers to stop Tiger Woods is to “lynch him in a back alley” is not fading away.
snippet: The Golfweek cover, featuring a noose, showed that the Golf Channel’s Kelly Tilghman comment that one way for young golfers to stop Tiger Woods is to “lynch him in a back alley” is not fading away.
